name: CrmManager
description: Manages CRM data. Supports Salesforce, Zoho CRM, and Monday.com.
author: ApexAgent Team

actions.name: create_lead
actions.description: Creates a new lead in the specified CRM service.

parameters.name: lead_data
parameters.description: Object containing lead details (e.g., first_name, last_name, email, company, phone, status)

actions.name: get_lead
actions.description: Retrieves lead details from the CRM service by ID.

parameters.name: lead_id
parameters.description: ID of the lead to retrieve

returns.description: Lead details object or null if not found

actions.name: update_lead
actions.description: Updates an existing lead in the CRM service.

parameters.name: lead_id
parameters.description: ID of the lead to update

actions.name: search_leads
actions.description: Searches for leads based on specified criteria.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: Search query or criteria (e.g., email='test@example.com', company='Acme Corp')

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of leads to return
